name: Our Sect Does Alchemy
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Boys' Love,Martial Arts,Wuxia,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
When the orphaned Bai Tian was taken back to a sect made up of salted fish* by the young taoist Yu Xiao, who he had never met before, Bai Tian’s whole heart was filled with the desire to obtain revenge for his parents. But as he started living a life free of worries, his goal seemed to drift farther and farther away . . . .
*T/N: Salted fish is a slang term for people who have no ambition whatsoever.

name: Miss Jiu
nutshell: Prince Yong, who was aiming for the country, replaced his recently born daughter with a boy from Old Chen Ge's place. More than ten years later, Chen family’s blue-blooded Miss Jiu grew up and learned martial arts, then entered a romantic entanglement with the scholarly young master of Jiang family, and Prince Bao who was out on an imperial patrol. One is a wanted anti-Qing handsome scholar who wants to restore the Ming dynasty, and the other is an extraordinary brilliant heir to the throne. Who should Miss Jiu pick?

name: Castle of Aerial Sulpulture
nutshell: A man mysteriously dies in front of Mitsuhiko Asami, who visits Aizu for coverage. Asami, who was involved in the incident, approaches the culprit with a beautiful female teacher he met in Aizu.

name: Overlord Official Comic A La Carte
nutshell: Overlord Official Comic A La Carte is a spin-off anthology manga loosely based on the Overlord series.

name: Tiger Land Squadron
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
A secret weapon developed by the Japanese military. It was a horrifying weapon that made one's hair stand on end!
Commander Tetsuo Seki, who transported the secret weapon to China with the Tiger Squadron led by Shingo, decides to take the brutal secret weapon into his own hands, as he cannot allow it to be used against the same people, no matter how much they may be enemies. But along the way, the guerrillas take it from him! The Tiger Land Forces continue to fight to erase the secret weapon from the world...!

name: Shaman
nutshell: Deadly chemicals, lab rats, mutations to the genes and a mysterious case of death. Shamans–the people who can see and treat the dead. One of them often spies a girl–the girl his step-brother choked to death.

name: Angel Beats! Original Comics
nutshell: A CD comic consisting of two short stories: Last Song and the 4-Koma

name: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 - I'm home.
nutshell: A story centered around Tieria and his recovery after the defeat of Celestial Being at the end of season 1 of Kidou Senshi Gundam 00. An official special oneshot from Newtype magazine, tying the two anime season’s together.

name: VR & RPG
tags: Monsters,Action,Long Strip,Comedy,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Video Games,Magic,Fantasy,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Mov Saga Online is an MMORPG based in virtual reality. Zerry has been a player since the game’s early days, yet he’s still stuck as a low-level novice. That’s because the idea of running through dungeons and completing quests has never interested him. He’d much rather stay cooped up in his virtual home, eating snacks all day. However, his gaming life takes a one-eighty when he suddenly stumbles upon a rare weapon that grants him exclusive access to an epic quest! With the encouragement and anticipation of his friend, Tana, Zerry finally begins leveling himself up to take on the challenge. But this epic quest will soon turn out to be much more than both players bargained for…

name: Lens no Mukou
nutshell: A couple subtly erotic one-shots. The first is about a woman's worries that she won't measure up to her girlfriend's past lovers. The second, about the same couple, is about how your hands get cold in the winter.

name: Tetsunagi Oni
nutshell:
A collection of horror and supernatural-themed short stories.
Had a second edition published in September 2005, and a third edition on October 10, 2011, the latter which contained an additional one-shot.

name: Happiness Charge Pretty Cure!
nutshell:
Some time ago, the opening of a box known as the "Axia" set loose the previously sealed members of the Phantom Empire into the world. Rising to protect humanity from these spiteful villains are warriors known as the Precure, whose heroic feats have garnered them celebrity status on television screens across the globe.
Hime Shirayuki, princess of the kingdom where the Axia was originally held, is one such warrior who transforms into "Cure Princess" to battle monsters summoned by the Empire. However, Hime's timid personality often hampers her success in fending off the enemy. Frustrated with her hard luck and determined to find a Precure partner, Hime befriends Megumi Aino, a happy-go-lucky teenager. When a general of the Phantom Empire appears, Hime fails to do much in the face of his attacks. Intent on protecting her new friend, Megumi ignites her hidden potential—transforming into "Cure Lovely."
With their sights set on protecting the world, Megumi and Hime form a new Precure team known as the "Happiness Charge Precure" whilst embarking on a journey to discover true love.

name: Vampire Princess
nutshell:
It is the Meiji era. Yui is completely bewildered by her sudden transfer to Kaede Juku, a prestigious girls' school. At that time, Yuu, the daughter of a large enterprise, appears before Yui.
Yui and Yuu's friendship immediately deepens. Although it seems as if they will spend time together peacefully, Yuu appears to have a mysterious air about her somewhere…

name: Love Live! Sunshine!! - School Idol Days S (Doujinshi)
Gomennasai Ojou-sama, Ore wa Maid ga Sukinan desu
nutshell: Love Triangle Romcom about a rich girl in love with her servant but the servant is in love with the maid!

name: The Son of the Godfather
nutshell:
The son of a yakuza boss befriends a young Tezuka.
A collection of 5 one-shots and short works for different Shonen Jump magazines.

Volume 179 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Wataru Seken wa Baka Bakari
nutshell: In middle school, Watabe Fuyuhiko was a top student in grades and sports, and he was looking forward to a glorious high school life. Unfortunately, three idiots stand in his way. Morino Koharu is obsessed with studying, and surpasses Watabe in academics, but she's utterly clueless about everything else. Saotome Akira is constantly exercising, and surpasses Watabe in sports, but her self-worth is tied up with her skill in sports. Izumi Chinatsu, on the other hand, is an all-around failure that simply gets in Watabe's way. Watabe interacts with Morino and Saotome to learn their secrets, and ends up paired with Izumi against his wishes. The three girls are all lonely and friendless, and interpret his interactions as friendly overtures. It looks like Watabe's school life is going to be very different than he imagined!

name: Hot Ice Tune
nutshell: Come and get them! Ice pops to cool down your blazing cheeks.

name: Panic Equation
nutshell: Kanna Shiraishi, the female president in a sailor suit. A strange guy who suddenly jumped into the super busy everyday. Sudden big panic!!

name: Rekka
nutshell: A short story of flowers during spring.

name: Otomen
nutshell: Asuka is a guy who has likings for girly things like shoujo manga, baking, and sewing. However, his mother forbids him being so and wants him to grow up manly. He starts learning kendo and karate and grows up to be stoic guy. But can he fight the urge of falling in love and hiding his real identity?

name: Joubutsu suru ni wa mada Hayai!
nutshell: One year after a suddenly-appeared virus annihilated the humans, three high school girls, Koharu, Natsuki, and Chiaki became ghosts and played around their school. During these days, plants vigorously grew on the Earth. It seemed that something had happened because of the virus. This is the slice-of-life “supernatural” comedy of high school girls playing around in the post-apocalypse world.

name: With Your Tail, Yes ♥
nutshell:
Five stories with wild skinship!
Satisfy your primal urges with <With Your Tail, Yes ♥>~

name: The Choice
nutshell:
To save one, she'll kill the other.
A miraculous, 1-in-200,000 chance birth of conjoined twins. The probability of their survival? Less than 5%. Born with just one heart between the two of them, the Kang sisters face a sinister fate: for one to survive, the other must die. Their mother faces a horrible choice. How would you decide?

name: The Grimoire of Marisa [Touhou Project]
nutshell: The Grimoire of Marisa (グリモワールオブマリサ Gurimowāru obu Marisa) is the third official Touhou book. Its focus is mainly on spell cards of many characters with screen shots of that spell card from the games, and comments written in the perspective of Marisa Kirisame, as she has made this album or scrapbook. It has art by Moriki Takeshi and Genji Asai.
